title: Hedda

overview: Hedda Gabler finds herself torn between the lingering ache of a past love and the quiet suffocation of her present life. title: The Roses

overview: Life seems easy for picture-perfect couple Ivy and Theo: successful careers, a loving marriage, great kids.
